About.paragraph:
TEK-UP is an institution that offers the opportunity to benefit from an academic education which is recognized and valued around the world.

The university awards the National Diploma in Computer Engineering or Telecommunications.
Why: Quality of studies: TEK-UP offers a high quality-learning environment. Education at the University covers specific skills and scientific methods that will enable graduates to improve their qualifications.

Diverse financing methods: There are many ways to finance your studies at TEK-UP. To help you afford a suitable education regardless your financial situation, TEK-UP may grant you a specific financing method where you can pay for your studies after graduation once you get your job.

International Certifications: every student has the opportunity to sit for almost 12 international certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, LPIC-1, LPIC-2, Microsoft MCP, Oracle JAVA, etc.Number Limited Students Policy: For each class, the number of students cannot exceed 24 persons.
Number Limited Students Policy: For each class, the number of students cannot exceed 24 persons.
